audioText: Ils ont bossé intensément toute la nuit pour terminer ce projet urgent.
question: How did they work all night to finish this urgent project?
explanation: The text states 'Ils ont bossé intensément toute la nuit pour terminer ce projet urgent' - They worked intensely all night to finish this urgent project. The verb 'bossé' (worked - past participle, informal) with adverb 'intensément' (intensely) describes dedicated work effort.
